No. 247461)} Sub: Posting on Transfer/ Rotation of Finance Personnel 1_ Background:- Circulars on the same subject have been periodically issued for the rotation/transfer of officers / officials, including Finance Personnel. Accordingly, in supersession to the earlier instructions o the subject matter, the Competent Authority has approved the following policy regarding posting on rotation/transfer in respect of the Finance Personnel of NHAI: 2 Scope: This policy is applicable to all Personnel of Finance Cadre (all levels, including regular and deputationists). All postings on rotation/transfer shall be dealt with in accordance with the principles enumerated in this policy and Delegation of Powers: 3 Definitions: - Family: The term 'family' shall be as defined in the Central Services (Medical Attendance) Rules, 1944 (as amended from time to time): (B) Spouse:- This means Personnel, whose spouse is an employee of   any Central/State Government Organisation/ PSU / Autonomous Body, etc. (C) NHAI HQ: National Highways Authority of India, 6-3, 5 & 6, Sector- 10, Dwarka, New Delhi 110 075. D) Region:- Defined State(s) or part of State(s) under the respective Regional Office, which constitutes Regional Office (RO) Project Implementation Unit (PIU) / Corridor Management Unit (CMU) / Site Office (SO) or any other office under the jurisdiction of the concerned Regional Officer. (E) Location: Means Regional Office (RO) /Project Implementation Unit (PIU)/Site Office (SO) /Corridor Management Unit (CMU) or any other office under the jurisdiction of the Regional Officer. (F) Cadre Controlling Authority Member (Admn.) / Chairman, being the Appointing Authority (as the case may be), shall be the concerned Cadre Controlling Authority. Contd_2I- '91 7 7 9 NHAL Reg:
